front.title: G.LSP Service Model framework in an Optical G-MPLS network

abstract.t: The objective of this draft is to propose an IP service model for anon-packet switch capable optical network where G.LSPs aredynamically triggered by the IP layer and subsequently advertisedfor IP routing. The business model assumes that several IP servicedomains, some of which represent different administrative entities,share the same optical backbone and focuses therefore primarily onan overlay model. G-MPLS signaling (refer to [g-mpls]) with UNIsupport is assumed as underlying control plane protocol.
